name: Full Stack Developer JavaScript (Middle+/Senior)

address.raw: Дубай, Красная линия, метро Всемирный торговый центр

description:
<head>

Searching for a confident Full stack Middle+/Senior level developer with at least 3 years of development experience. Experience in the role of Team Lead will be an advantage.

Project: p2p crypto exchange finector.io

We are looking not only for an employee, but also for a future partner (option in the project).

The team communicates in Russian, good knowledge of English is an advantage.

</head>

Technologies:

• back: node.js, JavaScript, TypeScript
• front: vue.js
• BD: SQL (mySQL, PostgreSQL)
• devops: nginx, docker, docker-compose, kubernetes, CI/CD, linux, github/gitlab
• testing: unit, integration testing
• management: jira, confluence, slack/telegram

Requirements:
• 3+ years of experience in commercial development;
• a good grip of building and architecting Blockchain/DeFi projects;

What tasks are facing you:
• development of functionality for current and new products of the company
• architecture design
• assessment of tasks
• command review code.

What skills we expect from you:
• successful web development experience
• experience with integrating blockchain services (for example: trongrid.io, infura.io etc)
• experience with Git-flow
• pure and documented code
• you are testing the code
• know how to give and receive feedback

Terms:
• working remotely;
• probationary period - 3 months;
• full time graphic (including part-time);
• option in the project

Responses with a cover letter will be a priority.
